mainText:
Promo: Bank of Entitlement - Where Every Customer is Royalty!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this, I stroll into a coffee shop, and the barista has the audacity to ask me to pay for my latte. I mean, do they not know who I am? I gracefully threw my entitlement card on the counter, demanded to speak to the manager, and made sure they knew that my caffeine fix should always be on the house. And you know what? They comped my drink and offered me a free pastry for my inconvenience. That's the power of being Hot Josh, baby, entitlement at its finest!
